subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Ahead is a painful off-season for the Bears, who could lose their defensive coordinator, Ron Rivera — a coaching candidate in Dallas — and must decide whether to place a franchise tag on Lance Briggs, a Pro Bowl player who can become a free agent.
